00010 typedef struct parser_t {
00011   dfsch_type_t* type;
00012   XML_Parser parser;
00013   
00014   dfsch_object_t* start_element_proc;
00015   dfsch_object_t* end_element_proc;
00016   dfsch_object_t* character_data_proc;
00017   dfsch_object_t* processing_instruction_proc;
00018   dfsch_object_t* comment_proc;
00019 
00020   dfsch_object_t* catch_tag;
00021   dfsch_object_t* catch_value;
00022 } parser_t;
00023 
00024 static dfsch_slot_t parser_slots[] = {
00025   DFSCH_OBJECT_SLOT(parser_t, start_element_proc, DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RW,
00026                     "Procedure called for start-tags"),
00027   DFSCH_OBJECT_SLOT(parser_t, end_element_proc, DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RW,
00028                     "Handler for end-tags"),
00029   DFSCH_OBJECT_SLOT(parser_t, character_data_proc, DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RW,
00030                     "Handler of character data"),
00031   DFSCH_OBJECT_SLOT(parser_t, processing_instruction_proc, 
00032                     DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RW,
00033                     "Handler for processing instructions (unimplemented)"),
00034   DFSCH_OBJECT_SLOT(parser_t, comment_proc, DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RW,
00035                     "Handler for comments (unimplemented)"),
00036   DFSCH_SLOT_TERMINATOR
00037 };

00039 dfsch_type_t dfsch_xml_parser_type = {
00040   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00041   NULL,
00042   sizeof(parser_t),
00043   "xml:parser",
00044   NULL,
00045   NULL,
00046   NULL,
00047   NULL,
00048   &parser_slots,
00049 };
00050 
00051 static XML_Memory_Handling_Suite gc_suite = {
00052   GC_malloc,
00053   GC_realloc,
00054   GC_free
00055 };
00056 
00057 static void parser_apply(parser_t* parser, 
00058                          dfsch_object_t* proc, 
00059                          dfsch_object_t* args){
00060   if (proc){
00061     DFSCH_SCATCH_BEGIN {
00062       dfsch_apply(proc, args);
00063     } DFSCH_SCATCH {
00064       parser->catch_tag = DFSCH_CATCH_TAG;
00065       parser->catch_value = DFSCH_CATCH_VALUE;
00066     } DFSCH_SCATCH_END;
00067   }
00068   
00069 }
00070 
00071 static XMLCALL void start_element_handler(parser_t* parser, 
00072                                           char *name,
00073                                           char **attrs){
00074   dfsch_object_t* a_list = NULL;
00075 
00076   while (*attrs){
00077     a_list = dfsch_cons(dfsch_list(2,
00078                                    dfsch_make_string_cstr(*attrs),
00079                                    dfsch_make_string_cstr(*(attrs+1))),
00080                         a_list);
00081     attrs+=2;
00082   }
00083 
00084   parser_apply(parser, 
00085                parser->start_element_proc,
00086                dfsch_list(2,
00087                           dfsch_make_string_cstr(name),
00088                           a_list));
00089 }
00090 static XMLCALL void end_element_handler(parser_t* parser, 
00091                                         char *name){
00092   parser_apply(parser, 
00093                parser->end_element_proc,
00094                dfsch_list(1,
00095                           dfsch_make_string_cstr(name)));
00096 }
00097 static XMLCALL void character_data_handler(parser_t* parser, 
00098                                            char *data,
00099                                            int len){
00100   parser_apply(parser, 
00101                parser->character_data_proc,
00102                dfsch_list(1,
00103                           dfsch_make_string_buf(data, len)));
00104 }
00105 
00106 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_xml_make_parser(char* encoding, int ns){
00107   static char sep = ':';
00108   parser_t* parser = (parser_t*)dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_XML_PARSER_TYPE);
00109 
00110   if (ns){
00111     parser->parser = XML_ParserCreate_MM(encoding, &gc_suite, &sep);
00112     /* Syntax for XML with namespace requires, that LocalPart of QName does not
00113      * contain colon, so last colon of combined string always separates 
00114      * Namespace URI and LocalPart.
00115      */
00116   } else {
00117     parser->parser = XML_ParserCreate_MM(encoding, &gc_suite, NULL);
00118   }
00119 
00120   XML_SetUserData(parser->parser, parser);
00121   XML_SetElementHandler(parser->parser, 
00122                         (XML_StartElementHandler)start_element_handler, 
00123                         (XML_EndElementHandler)end_element_handler);
00124   XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser->parser,
00125                               (XML_CharacterDataHandler)character_data_handler);
00126   
00127 
00128   return (dfsch_object_t*) parser;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void dfsch_xml_destroy_parser(dfsch_object_t* parser){
00132   parser_t* p;
00133   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(parser) != DFSCH_XML_PARSER_TYPE){
00134     dfsch_error("xml:not-a-parser", parser);
00135   }
00136 
00137   p = (parser_t*)parser;
00138 
00139   if (p->parser){
00140     XML_ParserFree(p->parser);
00141     p->parser = NULL;
00142   }
00143 }
00144 
00145 XML_Parser dfsch_xml_parser_ref(dfsch_object_t* parser){
00146   parser_t* p;
00147   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(parser) != DFSCH_XML_PARSER_TYPE){
00148     dfsch_error("xml:not-a-parser", parser);
00149   }
00150 
00151   p = (parser_t*)parser;
00152 
00153   if (!p->parser){
00154     dfsch_error("xml:parser-already-destroyed", parser);
00155   }
00156 
00157   return p->parser;
00158 }

00217 void dfsch_xml_parse_buf(dfsch_object_t* parser,
00218                              char* buf,
00219                              size_t len,
00220                              int eof){
00221   parser_t* p;
00222   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(parser) != DFSCH_XML_PARSER_TYPE){
00223     dfsch_error("xml:not-a-parser", parser);
00224   }
00225 
00226   p = (parser_t*)parser;
00227 
00228   if (!p->parser){
00229     dfsch_error("xml:parser-already-destroyed", parser);
00230   }
00231 
00232   p->catch_tag = NULL;
00233   p->catch_value = NULL;
00234 
00235   if (XML_Parse(p->parser, buf, len, eof) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00236     dfsch_xml_signal_error(p->parser);
00237   }
00238   
00239   if (p->catch_tag){
00240     dfsch_object_t* tag = p->catch_tag;
00241     dfsch_object_t* value = p->catch_value;
00242     p->catch_tag = NULL;
00243     p->catch_value = NULL;
00244     dfsch_throw(tag, value);
00245   }
00246 }
00247 void dfsch_xml_parse_strbuf(dfsch_object_t* parser,
00248                                 dfsch_strbuf_t* buf,
00249                                 int eof){
00250   dfsch_xml_parse_buf(parser, buf->ptr, buf->len, eof);
00251 }
00252 void dfsch_xml_parse_cstr(dfsch_object_t* parser,
00253                               char* str,
00254                               int eof){
00255   dfsch_xml_parse_buf(parser, str, strlen(str), eof);
00256 }
00257 void dfsch_xml_parse_eof(dfsch_object_t* parser){
00258   dfsch_xml_parse_buf(parser, NULL, 0, 1);
00259 }
00260 
00261 #define BUFFER_LENGTH 4096
00262 
00263 void dfsch_xml_parse_file(dfsch_object_t* parser,
00264                               char* filename,
00265                               int eof){
00266   FILE* f;
00267   parser_t* p;
00268   size_t r;
00269   char* buf;
00270 
00271   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(parser) != DFSCH_XML_PARSER_TYPE){
00272     dfsch_error("xml:not-a-parser", parser);
00273   }
00274 
00275   p = (parser_t*)parser;
00276 
00277   if (!p->parser){
00278     dfsch_error("xml:parser-already-destroyed", parser);
00279   }
00280 
00281   p->catch_tag = NULL;
00282   p->catch_value = NULL;
00283 
00284   f = fopen(filename, "r");
00285   if (!f){
00286     dfsch_error("xml:cannot-open-file", 
00287                 dfsch_list(2,
00288                            dfsch_make_string_cstr(filename),
00289                            dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(errno))));
00290   }
00291   
00292   while ((!feof(f)) && (!ferror(f))){
00293     buf = XML_GetBuffer(p->parser, BUFFER_LENGTH);
00294     r = fread(buf, 1, BUFFER_LENGTH, f);
00295     
00296     if (XML_ParseBuffer(p->parser, r, 0) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00297       fclose(f);
00298       dfsch_xml_signal_error(p->parser);
00299     }
00300     
00301     if (p->catch_tag){
00302       dfsch_object_t* tag = p->catch_tag;
00303       dfsch_object_t* value = p->catch_value;
00304       fclose(f);
00305       p->catch_tag = NULL;
00306       p->catch_value = NULL;
00307       dfsch_throw(tag, value);
00308     }
00309   }
00310   
00311   if (ferror(f)){
00312     dfsch_object_t* tmp = dfsch_list(2,
00313                                      dfsch_make_string_cstr(filename),
00314                                      dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(errno)));
00315     fclose(f);
00316     dfsch_error("xml:cannot-read-file", tmp);
00317   }
00318   
00319   fclose(f);
00320 
00321   if (eof){
00322     p->catch_tag = NULL;
00323     p->catch_value = NULL;
00324 
00325     if (XML_Parse(p->parser, NULL, 0, 1) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00326       dfsch_xml_signal_error(p->parser);
00327     }
00328 
00329     if (p->catch_tag){
00330       dfsch_object_t* tag = p->catch_tag;
00331       dfsch_object_t* value = p->catch_value;
00332       fclose(f);
00333       p->catch_tag = NULL;
00334       p->catch_value = NULL;
00335       dfsch_throw(tag, value);
00336     }    
00337   }
00338   
00339 }
00340 void dfsch_xml_parse_port(dfsch_object_t* parser,
00341                               dfsch_object_t* port,
00342                               int eof){
00343   parser_t* p;
00344   size_t r;
00345   char* buf;
00346 
00347   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(parser) != DFSCH_XML_PARSER_TYPE){
00348     dfsch_error("xml:not-a-parser", parser);
00349   }
00350 
00351   p = (parser_t*)parser;
00352 
00353   if (!p->parser){
00354     dfsch_error("xml:parser-already-destroyed", parser);
00355   }
00356 
00357   p->catch_tag = NULL;
00358   p->catch_value = NULL;
00359 
00360 
00361   while (1){
00362     buf = XML_GetBuffer(p->parser, BUFFER_LENGTH);
00363 
00364     r = dfsch_port_read_buf(port, buf, BUFFER_LENGTH);
00365     if (r==0){
00366       break;
00367     }
00368 
00369     if (XML_ParseBuffer(p->parser, r, 0) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00370       dfsch_xml_signal_error(p->parser);
00371     }
00372     
00373     if (p->catch_tag){
00374       dfsch_object_t* tag = p->catch_tag;
00375       dfsch_object_t* value = p->catch_value;
00376       p->catch_tag = NULL;
00377       p->catch_value = NULL;
00378       dfsch_throw(tag, value);
00379     }
00380   }
00381   
00382   if (eof){
00383     if (XML_Parse(p->parser, NULL, 0, 1) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00384       dfsch_xml_signal_error(p->parser);
00385     }
00386     
00387     if (p->catch_tag){
00388       dfsch_object_t* tag = p->catch_tag;
00389       dfsch_object_t* value = p->catch_value;
00390       p->catch_tag = NULL;
00391       p->catch_value = NULL;
00392       dfsch_throw(tag, value);
00393     }
00394   }
00395   
00396 }
00397 
00398 void dfsch_xml_signal_error(XML_Parser parser){
00399   enum XML_Error ec = XML_GetErrorCode(parser);
00400   int row = XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser);
00401   int col = XML_GetCurrentColumnNumber(parser);
00402 
00403   dfsch_error("xml:parse-error",
00404               dfsch_list(2,
00405                          dfsch_make_string_cstr(XML_ErrorString(ec)),
00406                          dfsch_cons(dfsch_make_number_from_long(row),
00407                                     dfsch_make_number_from_long(col))));
00408 }
